p.d: Bird-feeder, insect hotel, shelter, nesting box, pond... There are innumerable things you can do to welcome wildlife to your garden. Just a few kilometres from the city, a young family is turning their garden into a veritable sanctuary for biodiversity. We set off for a naturalist safari that's 100% local! Directed by: Marie-Anne Bertin, Sylvain Lefebvre (France, 2018)
